title: Tom, Daisy, Jordan, and Gatsby discuss cars and decide to switch, with Tom driving Gatsby's car.
text:
l with awnings, was dark and cool. Daisy and
Jordan lay upon an enormous couch, like silver idols weighing down
their own white dresses against the singing breeze of the fans.

“We can’t move,” they said together.

Jordan’s fingers, powdered white over their tan, rested for a moment
in mine.

“And Mr. Thomas Buchanan, the athlete?” I inquired.

Simultaneously I heard his voice, gruff, muffled

relations.explanation: Gatsby's house lights are no longer on, marking the end of his extravagant parties. He fires his servants to prevent gossip about Daisy's visits.
Wolfshiem wanted to do something for the people who are now Gatsby's servants.
The butler announces the arrival of Gatsby and Nick and takes their hats.
